org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.similarity

Interface VectorSimilarity

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CosineVectorSimilarity, DistanceVectorSimilarity, MutualInformationVectorSimilarity, PearsonCorrelation, SignificanceWeightedVectorSimilarity, SpearmanRankCorrelation

    @DefaultImplementation(value=CosineVectorSimilarity.class)
public interface VectorSimilarity
    Compute the similarity between sparse vectors.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isSparse()
      Query whether this similarity function is sparse (returns 0 for vectors with disjoint key sets).
      boolean isSymmetric()
      Query whether this similarity function is symmetric.
      double similarity(SparseVector vec1, SparseVector vec2)
      Compute the similarity between two vectors.

    • Method Detail

      • similarity

        double similarity(SparseVector vec1,
                SparseVector vec2)
        Compute the similarity between two vectors.
        Parameters:
        vec1 - The left vector to compare.
        vec2 - The right vector to compare.
        Returns:
        The similarity, in the range [-1,1].

      • isSparse

        boolean isSparse()
        Query whether this similarity function is sparse (returns 0 for vectors with disjoint key sets).
        Returns:
        true iff similarity(SparseVector, SparseVector) will always return true when applied to two vectors with no keys in common.

      • isSymmetric

        boolean isSymmetric()
        Query whether this similarity function is symmetric. Symmetric similarity functions return the same result when called on (A,B) and (B,A).
        Returns:
        true if the function is symmetric.
